Name: TWWWR
About the game: In this small action game you're tasked with ascending a large tower. You'll need to platform, fight and explore your way through the towers 5 different layers if you want to make it to the top. Use your firepower and agility to shoot away at enemies and dodge attacks. Customize your build with special trinkets found across the game's world. Dodge environmental hazards and platform your way forward. Controls: arrow keys: move A: jump S: shoot Features: 15+ trinkets to find to customize your playstyle 5 different areas to explore a variety of enemies and bosses to fight difficulty selection secrets to find Takes about 1-2 hours to finish
Developers: Faxdoc and nostalgiatree games,Faxdoc and nostalgiatree games
